input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product specifications and product name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product name:
Magic Metal Polished Quartz Bullet Black Crystal Necklace Druzy Mystic Boho Pendant Silver Tone NN30 Fashion Jewelry

Product specifications:
Ships from the USA
Black Quartz Crystal Set in a Silver Tone Empty Bullet Casing.
Crystal Pendant Measures 2 inches. Chain Laying Flat measures 30 inches.
Makes a perfect gift.
Search Magic Metal Jewelry for more jewelry styles.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Make a statement with this unique and edgy Magic Metal Polished Quartz Bullet Black Crystal Necklace. Set in a silver tone empty bullet casing, this druzy mystic boho pendant measures 2 inches and hangs on a 30-inch chain. Ships from the USA, this necklace makes the perfect gift and will be sure to turn heads. Search Magic Metal Jewelry for more unique jewelry styles and take advantage of our bulk order discounts. With full price shipping on your first item, and only fifty cents for shipping on each additional item added to your order, it's easy to stock up on your favorite pieces. And as always, Magic Metal Jewelry strives to have each and every customer satisfied and offers returns on all purchases.
input_text.Response B: The perfect gift for the magic-loving, crystal enthusiast in your life! This stunning necklace features a genuine black quartz crystal in a silver tone empty bullet casing. The bullet is intricately detailed and polished to a mirror finish. This necklace is the perfect accessory to add a little magic to any outfit.

label_annotations.factors_a: The reply included improvised details not present in the prompt.
